title: Hardy-Sobolev-Maz'ya inequalities for arbitrary domains
abstract: We prove a Hardy-Sobolev-Maz’ya inequality for arbitrary domains Ω ⊂ R^N with a constant depending only on the dimension N ≥ 3. In particular, for convex domains this settles a conjecture by Filippas, Maz’ya and Tertikas. As an application we derive Hardy-Lieb-Thirring inequalities for eigenvalues of Schrödinger operators on domains.
